description: Stores information about questions that pertain to prescriptions billed on the National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) interface.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: O_QUESN_NUM
columns.description: Identifies the question number/letter that the question response applies to (part of the question information).

columns.name: O_QUESN_PERC_RESP
columns.description: Percent response to a question (part of the question information).

columns.name: O_QUESN_RESP_DATE
columns.description: Date response to a question (part of the question information).

columns.name: O_QUESN_AMT_RESP
columns.description: Dollar Amount response to a question (part of the question information).

columns.name: O_QUESN_NUM_RESP
columns.description: Numeric response to a question (part of the question information).

columns.name: O_QUESN_ALPHA_RESP
columns.description: Alphanumeric response to a question (part of the question information).

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
